title: CrimeBot 2: Unsolved Cold Case
description: Become a detective in CrimeBot 2 and travel the world solving criminal cases. You'll have only your logic and intuition to analyze dossiers filled with clues, suspect profiles, and photographs. Can you catch the culprit?
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unravel thrilling murder mysteries in CrimeBot 2! Analyze clues, interrogate suspects, and solve cases in this ultimate detective game!
<!--text-->
üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Can you unmask the serial killer before he strikes again?

Step into the world of CrimeBot 2, the investigative simulator where every clue can change the course of a case.

Analyze realistic crime scenes, interrogate suspects, and examine case files filled with photos, reports, and evidence. Every detail matters as you search for the killer in gripping investigations inspired by real-life cold cases.

Two game modes:

üéØ Quick Match ‚Äì Short but intense mysteries generated procedurally to sharpen your detective skills.
üìñ Story Mode ‚Äì Travel through complex cases around the world, with deep narratives and shocking plot twists straight out of a thriller.

üíº Key Features:

Realistic investigative simulator

Cases inspired by unsolved real-life crimes

Detailed case files with evidence, suspects, and photographs

Interrogate suspects and try to incriminate or clear them by asking the right questions

Choices that impact the progression of the story

Immersive, ad-free interface

üëâ Download CrimeBot 2 and prove you have the intuition needed to solve the most intricate crimes in the world of investigative games.

<!--image-->
![CrimeBot 2-q5rxe](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b651aa7687bb4c0c93bb98565596700c/crimebot-2-q5rxe.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# The Art of Interrogation - Expansion
<!--text-->
We're excited to bring you our first expansion update: Patch 1.4.0 "The Art of Interrogation." In this update, suspect characters now come to life and can be interrogated. Your interrogation skills will let you unmask the culprit or clear the innocent, while Assistant Sophie springs to life, interacting directly at crime scenes. Additionally, the narrative has been extended with a richer, deeper plot.

What's new:

- Dynamic Suspects & Interrogations: Suspect characters now come to life. Engage in interrogations where your skill can reveal the culprit or clear the innocent. Remember, each interrogation consumes an investigation, so use them wisely!
- Enhanced Clue System: New clues enrich your investigations, making each case even more engaging.
- Interactive Assistant Sophie: Now active at crime scenes, Sophie brings valuable insights to your investigations.
- Expanded Narrative: Enjoy a story with deeper plot layers and more immersive gameplay.
- Bug Fixes: Various fixes to improve game stability and fluidity.

We sincerely thank all our players for the invaluable feedback and support. We will do our best to continue improving the game.

<!--image-->
![CrimeBot 2: Unsolved Cold Case-1cgv3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/b651aa7687bb4c0c93bb98565596700c/crimebot-2-unsolved-cold-case-1cgv3.jpg)
